remarks: In an algebraic closure system, if ` T ` is contained in the closure of ` S ` , there is a map ` f ` from ` T ` into the set of finite subsets of ` S ` such that the closure of ` U. ran f ` contains ` T ` .  This is proven by applying ~ acsficl2d to each element of ` T ` .  See Section II.5 in [Cohn] p. 81 to 82.  (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
